p: PGE 2 is another important mediator in inflammatory responses. Decreasing the PGE 2 production would be an effective strategy for suppressing inflammation. As shown in Figure 1(b), PGE 2 was inhibited by CS-LO. Especially, there was a significant inhibition on the expression of PGE 2 at the 10 Âµg/mL of CS-LO.
